actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Stony Fist or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Stony Fist
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 24 (4d8+6) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 17) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the stone giant isn't already grappling a creature.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 28 (4d10+6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Giant Attributes
special_abilities.desc: The stone giant is resistant to the stunned condition, and it is vulnerable to the prone condition.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The giant's Stealth is 20 while in rocky terrain.
